title: Swearing may unlock hidden strength, study finds
description: Letting a swear word fly when you’re struggling might do more than blow off steam—it could actually make you stronger. Research published by the American Psychological Association found that people who swear during physical challenges can push themselves harder and last longer. The boost seems to come from swearing’s ability to lower inhibitions, increase confidence, and help people slip into a focused “flow” state.
